synopsis.text: Awakened by the heartfelt tears of a young girl, Daru, a beloved handcrafted stuffed toy, embarks on a relentless quest to find her after being left behind in the hustle of an airport. As the girl's family rushes to catch their flight, Daru is accidentally separated from his cherished owner. Determined to reunite with her, Daru traverses the globe, forging connections with animals and inanimate objects alike, and even befriending a charming caterpillar. However, as time marches on, the girl's memories of Daru begin to fade. Will Daru's unwavering resolve and the power of their bond lead him back to the girl, or are they destined to remain apart? This captivating anime unfolds its touching narrative through music, with scarcely any dialogue to be heard.
